title: Anything done or any action taken in respect of S
clause_text: Anything done or any action taken in respect of S.R.S. prior to the commencement of the said Regulations shall be deemed to have been done or taken under the corresponding provisions of the said Regulations and provisions of the said Regulations shall be made applicable in relation thereto only to the extent, such application does not adversely affect the same.
section: The Slums On Non Buildable Area / Reservations :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
